title: Master Circular - Kisan Credit Card (KCC) Scheme
description: RBI detailing about the scheme that aims at providing adequate and timely credit support from the banking system under a single window with flexible and simplified procedure to the farmers for their cultivation and other needs

title: Natural Resource Management: Technologies Ready for Commercialization
description: This document details various agricultural technologies in the field of Natural Resource Management that are ready for commercial use

title: Soil Organic Carbon - the hidden potential
source_organization: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations
description: This publication provides an overview to decision-makers and practitioners of the main scientific facts and information regarding the current knowledge and knowledge gaps on Soil Organic Carbon
